title: Analyze Gene Expression Data from Microarray
description: A bioinformatician needs to analyze gene expression data from a microarray experiment to see how a drug affects a cancer cell line.

tasks.description: Import the raw microarray data files (e.g., CEL files).
Perform quality control checks and normalize the data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs QC checks and applies a normalization method like RMA.

tasks.description: Identify genes that are differentially expressed between the drug-treated and control samples.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs a statistical test and identifies a list of significantly up- and down-regulated genes.

tasks.description: Generate a heatmap to visualize the expression patterns of the significant genes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a heatmap that clearly shows the differences in gene expression between the two groups.
